name: 健康資訊服務研究
description: 本課程適合對於消費者健康資訊學有興趣之碩博班研究生選修。課程結合理論與實務，並從跨領域科學的角度，以圖書資訊學為核心，延展至實證醫學、醫療資訊、健康護理等相關概念。課程分成三個模組，（一）消費者健康資訊學的基礎概念與相關研究、（二）各類健康資訊服務、（三）網路健康資訊服務設計，希望在Health 2.0與eHealth等因應網路時代變革帶給醫療健康領域的新展望，可以在本課程中得到實物方面的啓發。
goals: 瞭解消費者健康資訊學的核心概念
執行健康資訊學方向的使用者研究
探索網際網路帶給健康資訊學的潛能與影響
設計以網路為互動平台的健康資訊服務
syllabus:
Introduction to the course

Introduction to consumer health informatics

Health information and library services

Medical and health libraries

Medical and health information resources

Consumer health informatics research: Research areas, tools, resources, and trends

Consumer health informatics research: User study

Consumer health informatics research: System evaluation

Consumer health informatics research: Multiple stakeholder perspectives- Medical professional, caretakers, and patients

Midterm Week  

Online health information services: MD rating & review

Online health information services: Social Q&A and online medical consultation

Online health information services: Treatment and recovery comparison

Online health information services: Special patients’ groups

Online health information services design: Needs assessment and market research

Online health information service design: System design & development

Online health information service design: System implementation and evaluation

Final project presentation
